isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL HOOD GRILLE

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 4 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To install grille assembly (Item 1), have hood assembly (Item 2) closed and latched.
Position grille assembly (Item 1) onto four grille mounting studs (Item 5), two each side, on the hood assembly (Item 2).

Install eight flat washers (Item 4), two flat washers go over each of the four grille mounting studs (Item 5), then install four high crown nuts (Item 3) securing the grille assembly (Item 1) to the hood assembly (Item 2) and tighten.

note.para: Grille surround (Trim) shown in the Figure 4 as (Item 6) is not used on the 9100 i Model.

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Grille on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 5 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To install grille assembly (Item 1), have hood assembly (Item 2) closed.
Position grille assembly (Item 1) onto four grille mounting studs (Item 5), two each side, on the hood assembly (Item 2).

Install four high crown nuts (Item 3) and four flat washers (Item 4) onto four grille mounting studs (Item 5), two each side, securing the grille assembly (Item 1) to the hood assembly (Item 2) and tighten.

svcsubproc.title: Install Stationary Grille on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 6 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To install grille assembly (Item 1), have hood assembly in the full open position.
Position grille assembly (Item 1) at the grille radiator mounting brackets (Item 6).

note.para: Before installing mounting hardware (Items 2, 3, 4 and 5) holding the grille assembly (Item 1) in place on the radiator, locate marking on the grille radiator mounting bracket (Item 6) showing which of the two slots (view in circle A) the hex bolt (Item 5) was removed from, and re-install grille assembly mounting hardware through the correct mounting slots.

step1.para: Once the correct mounting slots have been located on the grille radiator mounting brackets (Item 6), install four hex bolts (Item 5), two each side, through the grille radiator mounting brackets and grille assembly (Item 1) and install four flat washers (Item 4), four spring lock washers (Item 3) and four high crown nuts (Item 2) and tighten.

svcsubproc.title: Install Grille on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 7 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To install the grille assembly (Item 1) or Shutters if so equipped, the hood assembly does not have to be removed or raised.
Position grille assembly (Item 1) at the left and right radiator/grille brackets (Item 3).
Install five pan head screws (Item 2) on each side of the grille assembly (Item 1) and tighten.
